    1|      2|fn func(x: i32) -> bool {
  ------------------
  | merge::main:
  |    1|       |fn func(x: i32) -> bool {
  ------------------
  | merge::main:
  |    1|       |fn func(x: i32) -> bool {
  ------------------
    2|      2|    if x < 0 {
    3|      1|        true
    4|       |    } else {
    5|      1|        false
    6|       |    }
    7|      2|}
  ------------------
  | merge::func:
  |    1|      1|fn func(x: i32) -> bool {
  |    2|      1|    if x < 0 {
  |    3|      1|        true
  |    4|       |    } else {
  |    5|      0|        false
  |    6|       |    }
  |    7|      1|}
  ------------------
  | merge::func:
  |    1|      1|fn func(x: i32) -> bool {
  |    2|      1|    if x < 0 {
  |    3|      0|        true
  |    4|       |    } else {
  |    5|      1|        false
  |    6|       |    }
  |    7|      1|}
  ------------------
    8|       |
    9|      2|#[test]
  ------------------
  | merge::test::{closure#0}:
  |    9|      1|#[test]
  ------------------
  | merge::test::{closure#0}:
  |    9|      1|#[test]
  ------------------
   10|      1|fn test() {
   11|      1|    #[cfg(feature = "a")]
   12|      1|    assert!(!func(1));
   13|      1|    #[cfg(feature = "b")]
   14|      1|    assert!(func(-1));
   15|      2|}
  ------------------
  | merge::test:
  |   10|      1|fn test() {
  |   11|      1|    #[cfg(feature = "a")]
  |   12|      1|    assert!(!func(1));
  |   13|      1|    #[cfg(feature = "b")]
  |   14|      1|    assert!(func(-1));
  |   15|      1|}
  ------------------
  | merge::test:
  |   10|      1|fn test() {
  |   11|      1|    #[cfg(feature = "a")]
  |   12|      1|    assert!(!func(1));
  |   13|       |    #[cfg(feature = "b")]
  |   14|       |    assert!(func(-1));
  |   15|      1|}
  ------------------
